story.text: In the creation of software we should always consider how and to what extent this helps to perpetuate our values into the wider world.
Always think "is what I'm doing helping or harming the things and/or people I value".
Too often outside of the world of FOSS, software developers are distracted by money into actively working against their own values in a manner which is self-defeating and damaging to society.

item.text: In the creation of software we should always consider how and to what extent this helps to perpetuate our values into the wider society.
Always think "is what I'm doing helping or harming the things and/or people I value".
Too often outside of the world of FOSS, software developers are distracted by money into actively working against their own values in a manner which is self-defeating and harms the community.
Too often outside of the world of FOSS, software developers are distracted by money into actively working against their own values in a manner which is self-defeating and damaging to society.
In the creation of software we should always consider how and to what extent this helps to perpetuate our values into the wider world.
